In this release:
- configurable home page was added;
- on the cluster details page, information about the installation was moved from a dedicated widget into the About widget.
See [./docs/releases/v0.47.0-changelog.md](https://github.com/giantswarm/backstage/blob/main/docs/releases/v0.47.0-changelog.md) for more information.
